title.narrative: EFICACIA Y EFICIENCIA EN USO DE RECURSOS REGALIAS

description.narrative: Fortalecer las capacidades de gestión pública territorial y nacional en el uso eficaz y eficiente de los recursos provenientes del Sistema General de Regalías (SGR)

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.3.2.2.1

description.narrative: Country has improved capacities for dialogue, consensus-building and reconciliation around contested issues, with equal participation of women and men

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.2.C

description.narrative: Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With urban development plans and strategies in line with the New Urban Agenda under implementation

description.narrative: Women's participation in elections: Number of women on the governing mechanism of the electoral management body
